Events.Text: Just nosy.░ Though now you mention it....
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>I felt her eyes run over me in return,░ flushing a little as she smiled that same confident smile she had at the club.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Don't worry, %playername%.░ I'll leave you in one piece,░ wouldn't want your brother getting the wrong idea.

Events.Text: That new outfit's a bit much,░ don't you think?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Well,░ forgive me for trying to make an impression...░ You have been on a date before, right?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: The outfit looks pretty new.░ You gonna be okay hiking?░ It's a couple miles around the trail.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Hey...░ I'm fitter than I look, don't worry about me.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Don't worry,░ you can set the pace.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: I imagine this'll be a little easy for you, it's only a couple of miles around the trail.░ Not gonna leave me in the dust are you?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Hey,░ I'm here with you.░ You set the pace.░ If you get tired...░ Well,░ maybe I can carry you?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: It's a deal.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: It's a couple of miles around the trail,░ how's that sound to you?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Sounds alright to me,░ I've got the afternoon freed up either way.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Don't worry,░ you can set the pace.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: I picked up a few things for after, sandwiches and stuff.░ I figured we could have a picnic?░
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Sounds great to me!
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Beats the sports bars I packed...░ I guess I still have to step up a little to match her preparation.░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Good.░ Well, better get started,░ the outfit is made for excercise after all!
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>With that, we headed off towards the nature trail side-by-side.░ The sun was high and the way forward was a well-worn dirt path through the trees,░ even never having taken this particular path before, I would probably have no trouble following it.░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Mercy, on the other hand,░ was more than familiar with the route:░ pointing out the loose stones and taking the path with absentminded ease.░ I got the feeling her eyes were more on me than the path ahead.░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: So...░ you take this path every day?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Pretty much!░ It gives me a chance to clear my head.░ Anyway...░ after the other night a little detox was in order, huh?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Makes sense.░ Good to be health conscious at least.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Right.░ Oh,░ hey, watch out for these rocks,░ they can be loose going down here.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: But, yeah,░ I tend to do gallery paperwork in the morning,░ then come out here.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Good idea.░ I guess I've never gone to a gallery in the middle of the afternoon on a week day.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Exactly.░ I tend to work in the evenings mostly.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: That schedule can suck,░ I've worked it a few times myself.░ I always struggled to find time to socialize, ░working when everyone was finished with their work.░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: It's not like I don't get chance to cut loose sometimes,░ make a fool of myself at the club, for example.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: I'm glad you're making the most of your afternoons.░ I've got to say, I didn't expect it to be this beautiful up here.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Which I'm certainly thankful for.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: You can't beat a breath of fresh air,░ get away from the roads and noise a little.░ It's a good place to come in the evening too.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Yeah, it's quite the make-out point.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: ...I imagine.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Gasp!░ %playername%,░ are you saying you've held hands with a girl before?░ For shame!
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: We're both adults,░ I'm not really interested in hearing anything that'd make me jealous,░ but I don't exactly need the innocent act...░
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Yeah...░ Act,░ sure.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Well, okay.░ I should be happy to get you here first then?░ How about that?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>It was hard to stay self-conscious with her eyes gliding over my blush and her infectious grin.░ I let my arm swing out so my hand could stroke across the back of her own.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Right.░ I'm glad I get the tour from you anyway.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Good to know,░ you don't exactly seem like the type to mind a little experience.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: So,░ we're in jealousy territory are we?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Mercy took my hand as we stepped down a steeper part of the path.░ We simply shared a grin.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>I stepped closer, nudging her hip playfully with my own.░ She caught my smile.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Jealous just means competitive with me.░ Can't blame me there, I hope.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>She nudged me back, biting her lip playfully.░ I couldn't help but chuckle.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: No complaints...░ Just wish I had better stories now...
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>The path wound steadily down through the trees as we made our idle chat.░ What musicians we enjoyed,░ how long we'd been in the area,░ the usual.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Before I knew it we'd wiled away much of the route down and had started the harder ascent back towards the parking lot.
Events.Title: %playername%

Choices.Text: I've got this, no problem! (Push ahead to show off.)
(Take my time, enjoy the view. (Let her lead the way.))

Events.Text: <i>I didn't want to let Mercy lead the way the whole time,░ a little proof that I could handle a little strenuous activity.░ The hill rose up ahead of us as I took the lead on the path,░ stepping from rock to rock with poise to create a little distance.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>It was harder going than I'd anticipated,░ but I kept my footing well enough,░ stepping either side of the worn path to keep my footing on the rocks and tussocks of grass.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>I was honestly glad she wasn't there beside me to hear me huffing.░ Coby was right,░ this wasn't exactly my usual fare...
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>I wasn't adverse to a little hard work,░ hopping my way up the hill's natural steps at a good pace as I got into a breathing rhythm.░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>The way was tough but,░ save a little panting,░ I was able to maintain the pace,░ seeing Mercy only a few steps behind me.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Ha...░ Not pushing yourself too hard I hope?

Events.Text: Whoop!░ Look at you!░ I should've picked a tougher route!

Events.Text: Hey...░ I promised not to leave you in the dust.░ A longer trail just means more time with you...░ (in that outfit.)

Events.Text: I heard that!

Events.Text: Me?...░ Nah...░ Beats the hell out of a step aerobics!
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Well good!░ It's not like I'm not enjoying the view from back here!
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>I smirked, chuckling a little through my heavy breathing as I was sure to shake my hips with each step,░ if she was enjoying the show I should at least try to put one on.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>I was here with Mercy,░ and she knew the trail better,░ the chance to spend more quiet time beside her was first and foremost in my mind.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>I didn't really think showing off was what either of us had in mind for the afternoon. Anyway,░ better not to ware myself out and spend the picnic dripping all over the food:░ it wouldn't make the best impression.░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Mercy found the pace easy enough as we forged on up the hill.░ Breathing heavily, there wasn't much talking to be had as we took the natural step formation of the slope up towards the summit.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Flush with the effort, I had to admit the proximity to the athletic satyr was having an effect on me too;░ thighs pumping side-by-side,░ I couldn't help but sneak glances when my footing was safe enough to do so,░ the cream fur of her underbelly tensing with each step up,░ the bright blue of her sports bra drew my gaze more than once as it held her bust firm despite the exertion.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>If she noticed my wandering eyes,░ she didn't say anything in her sideways glances to check on me.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Neugh...░ Almost there!
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Phew...░ Almost there!
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>Mercy was the expert here,░ and the path up was steep,░ it was best to follow her lead.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>The hillside formed natural steps in the dirt where tussocks of grass or jutting stones had diverted the rain and hikers before us.░ The trail itself had a natural beauty to it that was hard to deny,░ it certainly beat sitting around at home running through computer-generated forests in SkyFam: DragonBarb...
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>The natural beauty aside,░ there was more than enough to occupy my mind on the trail.░ Mercy stepped up expertly from rocky step to rocky step as we ascended,░ strong hips working with each push.░ Knowing the path she took gave me time to enjoy the view of her, rather than forging my own way.░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>I was grateful for the small distance between us,░ and the physical exercise to keep us both panting,░ as I watched Mercy's short fluffy tail bob with each step above the firm curves of her ass.░ Her thighs,░ powerful with muscle,░ gave the whole area a hypnotic curviness as those tight shorts served to accentuate the roundness of her butt.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>I could've watched her climb all day and only when she spoke up,░ looking back,░ did I realize we had already covered most of the distance.░ The power of positive distractions I guess?░ Maybe I'd feel the cramp in my legs later,░ but, for now, the only strain was slightly higher,░ tucked against the hem of my underwear.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Taking the last couple of steps up,░ I huffed triumphantly, catching my breath as we stood side-by-side to look down at the treeline spread below us.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: We did it...
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Yeah,░ and under the time I figured on.

Events.Text: Putting me through my paces?░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Maybe...░ And showing off a little,░ didn't want you thinking I'm only good for looking pretty and drinking cocktails.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>Her playful grin was quick to return as her eyes looked me over.

Events.Text: Hey,░ if you do this every day then consider that myth officially squashed.░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Mission accomplished then.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: How'd I measure up,░ anyway?░ For ego's sake.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Taking a deep drink from her water bottle she cocked her head a little,░ giving me another look over in an almost preditory way.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Must say I'm impressed...░ Wasn't sure if you'd be up for it.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Hey,░ this is all cleverly disguised muscle!
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Not judging...░ You look good!░ Just didn't want to give you a hard time.

Events.Text: Have to say...░ You know those girls who hang out at gyms totally pretending to be working out,░ just so they can ogle the pros?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Yeah?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Well,░ give me a call the next time you need a spotter,░ okay?

Events.Text: You don't exactly strike me as the towel holding kind...░ Anyway,░ in that outfit?░ I think I'm gonna need to keep an eye on you if we went to work out...░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: You passed with flying colors.░ I wasn't so sure on your stamina,░ but now I know how far I can push you.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Ha...░ Give me a few more weeks on this hill and I'll give you a run for your money.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I can wait.░ Anyway,░ there's more than one way to get breathless up here...

Events.Text: Got to say,░ the scenery was improved watching you power up the hill.░ Thirsty work...
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>She smirked, giving my hips one last look, slipping the backpack free and holding it in front of her as we walked together the last few yards to the parking lot.░ Good,░ I didn't show off for nothing.

Events.Text: Anyway,░ don't pretend like you weren't checking out my ass the whole way up the hill.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>She didn't look mad about it,░ and I suppose certain elements of my enjoyment might have been more obvious than intended.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I'm sure you can't blame me.░ Seems to me like the feeling is mutual?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Oh, it's mutual.░ You think I'd let you follow behind me if I didn't want you to enjoy the view?

Events.Text: Glad I could leave an impression.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Let's not pretend like the tight outfits and panting bodies weren't of mutual enjoyment.

Events.Text: Schemes.░ Plots.░ Can't we just say 'Nice outfit you have there.' and know what we really mean?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>I met her eyes and felt the grin spreading across my face as I took a gulp of my water.░

Events.Text: Ten out of ten.

Events.Text: 'Nice outfit you have there' yourself, Mercy.

Events.Text: A positive one,░ trust me.

Events.Text: Well...░ We can keep talking about our outfits until evening,░ or we can have sandwiches?

Events.Text: <i>Stopping quickly at our mutual cars gave me time to catch my breath and re-apply deodorant,░ toweling off and grabbing more water for us both.

Events.Text: <i>Coby had managed to only send three texts whilst we were gone,░ he must have found someone to hang with too.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>I wasn't sure who was a worse tease,░ Mercy or Coby:░ certainly they'd probably whip each other into a frenzy,░ but her abject compliments weren't far from my own thoughts...░ If I was really being honest with myself,░ I might have been a little disappointed if she was shy and reserved without the drink.

Events.Text: Help yourself!
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: You made all this stuff?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Sitting down beside her,░ my legs were certainly feeling that hill now.░ Mercy had laid out a few thickly sliced and well-stacked sandwiches,░ she even had chips and a few deli snacks.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Honestly...░ Most of it's from the store, <i>haha...
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Not much of a cook?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I can cook,░ yeah.░ I just didn't have long between work this morning.

Events.Text: <i>She gave a sheepish grin, which she tried to hide behind her sandwich half.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Anyway,░ I wasn't sure when you'd be joining me.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Did you think I'd bail?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I hoped not,░ but we didn't settle on a day, after all.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>As I helped myself to one of the cheese stuffed peppers,░ I caught her mouth a quick 'thanks again' before returning to her contented grin.

Events.Text: So,░ I was meaning to ask.░ We talked about music, TV, all that stuff,░ but you never mentioned your own art.░ You have a gallery, right?

Events.Text: <i>She nodded,░ clearing her throat with the water as she rested back in the grass on her elbow.░ The sun played through her hair and I simply watched her for a moment, forgetting all about the food.

Events.Text: I used to, a long time ago.░ Hah,░ honestly?░ I wasn't all that good.

Events.Text: <i>I must've been giving a pretty obviously puzzled look, because she laughed.

Events.Text: I graduated from art school and everything.░ But the gallery was actually my aunt's,░ she passed away and since my own parents know squat about art,░ let alone managing a gallery,░ they passed it on to me.

Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>She looked wistful for a moment before shaking it off.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: My aunt was well-liked in the art scene.░ I just keep up her community spirit.░ I rent a couple of studios out to local artists,░ a few friends from college you know?░ I'm sort of a glorified secretary.

Events.Text: Nah.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: It sounds more important than that.░ It's cool that you can preserve your aunt's legacy and give back to other artists.░
Events.Title: %playername%

Choices.Text: It sounds more important than that.
You don't get to slip your own art into the exhibits?

Events.Text: I barely keep in contact with people from my last job,░ let alone from school.░ It sounds like a good way to keep the gang together.░ I'd love to meet them,░ and see your gallery, sometime.

Events.Text: Oh no, no...░ Not ready for that.░ Let's wait on that plan,░ I want a little more to tell them than I got drunk and gave you my number at Amorous of all places...

Events.Text: Hey,░ I'm just your hiking buddy,░ I'm sure neither of us would make a fool of ourselves at a club.

Events.Text: Right,░ thanks.░ Though considering a lot of them are artists,░ and a similar age,░ they're pretty open-minded.

Events.Text: Even if that's true, it seems to be working out well financially...░ It was a smart move to keep the gallery running.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I'm sure your friends appreciate the studios too?░ I'd love to meet them some time,░ maybe for drinks or something if the gallery isn't really a place you enjoy.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Well,░ even if you aren't a huge fan of your own work,░ I guess you have a venue to display it, right?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I imagine it can be it own sort of fun watching your friends and clients compete for your good graces.░ I'd love to meet the artist friends you think are worth the gallery space.

Events.Text: <i>She rolled onto her back,░ knees up and together, and looked into the sky,░ her infectious smile still strong.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Hey, %playername%?

Events.Text: Yeah?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Come be my pillow?

Events.Text: I don't know, Mercy.░ It's getting a little late...

Events.Text: Oh...░ Well, I was hoping we'd get a chance to chat more.░
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Okay,░ I can stay for a while.░ What did you want to say?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Straight to the point then?░ Okay...
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: I'm just kidding!░ Hey,░ after all that teasing and the hill climbing?░ I think I'm owed one?

Events.Text: You get one of those.░ I'm not trying to be coy,░ but I'm not going to beg either...

Events.Text: Yeah...

Events.Text: Don't ask...

Events.Text: <i>Sliding over to her, I sat on the edge of the blanket,░ allowing myself to fall back until our heads were almost touching, ear-to-ear.░ Stretching my arm out,░ I expected her to use it as a pillow:░ instead she lifted her hips, pushing back with her hooves to bring the back of her head down to rest on my chest.

Events.Text: <i>Looking up at the clouds,░ I was glad she couldn't see the Cheshire cat grin I had on my face.░ I curled my arm around to gently stroke the soft fur of her shoulder.░ She let out a happy sigh,░ the back of her fingers running along the outside of my thigh idly.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>I wasn't sure how long we watched the clouds for until...

Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>I have to say,░ her cocky grins and teasing set my heart racing:░ but she was kind of cute when she was sleeping, hair tousled over her eyes.░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>My eyes traveled down her body;░ her bust was pert in the tight sports bra,░ she was practically spilling out of it with her arm under her.░ She certainly had a talent for picking outfits to show off her assets,░ not that I could blame her...░ or ever dare complain, especially with the bird's-eye view I had now.

Events.Text: <i>She shifted slightly and let out a small grumble under her breath,░ nudging me with her snout in such a way that made me think she had noticed my wandering eyes for a moment.░ But her own eyes were still closed.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>My eyes fell over her lap,░ as I realized she was squirming for another reason.

Events.Text: <i>I couldn't help but squirm a little myself,░ eyes running over her endowment from base to tip, getting a feel for the shape of her:░ thick, the tip seeming to come to a cutely bulbous end typical for many species.░ Not 'hung like a horse' then,░ despite her bovid heritage,░ but still nicely proportioned...

Events.Text: <i>Admiring her this way felt a little bad,░ considering what had happened back at the club,░ it was best not to assume she was happy with her own... situation.░ I let out a heavy sigh as if waking and softly ran my fingers across the arm that still had a grip around my rib cage.░ She groaned groggily and her eyes fluttered open to meet mine.

Events.Text: <i>The last thing I wanted to do was sound condescending,░ but broaching the topic felt somewhat like a minefield.░ I certainly couldn't just blurt out 'Hey, I notice you're rock hard'.

Events.Text: Sighing,░ she looked out at the skyline for a moment, silence coming between us whilst I searched for something to say.░ 'It's okay' or 'I don't mind'?░ No...░ what if she minded?

Events.Text: <i>Before she could say any more I slipped my hand around her waist and drew her in for a kiss.░ Her eyes widened and,░ for a moment,░ I thought she was going to push me away before they closed again and she tilted her muzzle into the act.

Events.Text: <i>Our lips rolled over each other in a slow, tidal passion as we leaned into each other.░ My arm across her back,░ her bust to my chest,░ our tongues exploring each other for what was likely longer than our little nap.

Events.Text: <i>In our enthusiasm, we fell back onto the grass:░ my arms around her waist,░ legs tangled as I lost myself in our kiss.░ Time stretched until our lips finally we separated,░ panting softly against each other.

Events.Text: %playername%...

Events.Text: <i>Before she could say more,░ I slipped my hand around her waist and drew her close,░ hugging around her soft feminine frame.░ She returned the gesture in an instant,░ hands cupping my back as she planted a kiss into the crook of my neck that made my body melt.░

Events.Text: <i>We fell back onto the grass,░ arms around each other, with her head resting on my arm as we simply listened to the world passing us by for a while.

Events.Text: <i>We shared a compassionate look over the remains of the picnic and I shuffled closer so we could sit together,░ side-by-side to watch the sun start to fade.

Events.Text: <i>Giardino d'Acqua was set back from the road,░ the squat building there in the middle of a curving stream that acted as a moat you had to cross on an ornate wooden bridge.░ In the evening light, the flowers and varied plants were lit by subtle lamps raising from the water.░ The restaurant itself had open veranda's looking down on the fish ponds linked by the artificial stream channels,░ I gulped a little...░ certainly a fancy place.

Events.Text: <i>The sound of classy music came from the open door where a maitre d' in a pristine suit was waiting to take reservations.░ I cleared my throat and made my way up to confirm our reservation.
